H0.text: Which of the four acting McGann brothers is missing from Mark, Stephen, Joe and ...... John

H1.text: Which of the four acting McGann brothers is missing from Mark, Stephen, Joe and ...... Michael

H2.text: Which of the four acting McGann brothers is missing from Mark, Stephen, Joe and ...... David

H3.text: Which of the four acting McGann brothers is missing from Mark, Stephen, Joe and ...... PAUL

A4.text: All three of his brothers are also actors and the four of them played brothers in the 1995 TV serial The Hanging Gale.

A5.text: He has an older brother, Joe, and three younger siblings: brothers Mark and Stephen and sister Clare.
